# isEmojiModifierBase

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the scalar is one whose appearance can be changed by an emoji modifier that follows it.

## Declaration

```swift
var isEmojiModifierBase: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property corresponds to the “Emoji_Modifier_Base” property in the [http://www.unicode.org/versions/latest/].
title: isEmojiModifierBase
